Annotation Interface MenuOption

@Repeatable(MenuOptionContainer.class) @Target(METHOD) @Retention(RUNTIME) public @interface MenuOption
Used to define SelectOptions for StringSelectMenus.
See Also:
  • StringSelectMenu

  • Required Element Summary

    Required Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Required Element
    Description
    String
    label
    Gets the label of an option.
    String
    value
    Gets the value of an option.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    String
    description
    Gets the description of an option.
    String
    emoji
    Gets the Emoji of an option.
    boolean
    isDefault
    Gets whether this option is a default option.

  • Element Details

    • label

      String label
      Gets the label of an option.
      Returns:
      the label

    • value

      String value
      Gets the value of an option.
      Returns:
      the value

    • description

      String description
      Gets the description of an option.
      Returns:
      the description
      Default:
      ""

    • emoji

      String emoji
      Gets the Emoji of an option.
      Returns:
      the Emoji
      Default:
      ""

    • isDefault

      boolean isDefault
      Gets whether this option is a default option.
      Returns:
      true if this MenuOption is a default option
      Default:
      false
